title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 200.4 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 200.4 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provisions of this Subchapter are held invalid, such
invalidity shall not affect other provisions which can be given effect without
the invalid provisions. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
